content: f ice beanie skill level - advanced beginner this pattern is free but i encourage you to make a donation to immigrant relief organizations if you are able pattern includes chart instructions this pattern is untested if you find any errors or have any suggestions for improvement please feel free to reach out to me pattern uses approx 80-90 yards of super bulky yarn yarn used is lionbrand thick & quick you will need 9mm 16 inch circular knitting needles and optional dpns for decreases if you have any questions please feel free to email me at wildwooddesignsme@gmail com follow me on instagram @wildwooddesignsme
